remarks: The ` Y ` -th index projection annihilates elements of other factors. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dpjfval.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dpjfval.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dpjfval.p $e |- P = ( G dProj S ) $.
dpjlid.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
dpjlid.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( S ` X ) ) $.
dpjrid.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dpjrid.5 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. I ) $.
dpjrid.6 $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= X ) $.
dpjrid $p |- ( ph -> ( ( P ` Y ) ` A ) = .0. ) $.
